description:
Lotto.withdrawLeftOver() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/lotto/lotto_2round.sol#18-22) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/lotto/lotto_2round.sol#21)

Lotto.winner (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/lotto/lotto_2round.sol#6) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- Lotto.sendToWinner() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/lotto/lotto_2round.sol#9-16)

Lotto.winAmount (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/lotto/lotto_2round.sol#7) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- Lotto.sendToWinner() (shared/unchecked_low_level_calls/lotto/lotto_2round.sol#9-16)
